isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - INSTALL - INSTALL MUD GUARDS

svcsubproc.title: Install Mud Guards on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA) and 9400 i (SBA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 25 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position mud guard reinforcement (Item 6) and mud guard (Item 5) on the inside of the fender extension (Item 7). Install three hex bolts with flat washers (Items 1 and 2) through the fender extension, mud guard and mud guard reinforcement and install three lock washers and hex nuts (Items 3 and 4) and tighten, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side mud guard.

svcsubproc.title: Install Mud Guards on 9200 i (SBA) and 9400 i (SBA) with Chassis Side skirts
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 26 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position mud guard retainer plate (Item 6) and mud guard (Item 5) on the front side of the mud guard mounting bracket (Item 7). Install four hex bolts with flat washers (Items 1 and 2) through the mud guard mounting bracket, mud guard and mud guard retainer plate and install four hex nuts and lock washers (Items 3 and 4) and tighten, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to remove passenger side mud guard.

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood-Bumper Mud Guards on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA) and 9400 i (SBA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 27 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, position hood-bumper mud guard (Item 3) under the front of the hood assembly (Item 6) and over the studs of the hood-bumper mud guard weldstud plate (Item 4) located in the headlight opening (Item 5). Install two hex nuts and flat washers (Items 1 and 2) and tighten, headlight removed for clarity, driver and passenger side shown.
Install push-in fastener (Item 7), securing the hood-bumper mud guard (Item 3) to the underside of the hood assembly (Item 6), driver and passenger side shown.
Close the hood, and fasten the hood latches on both sides.

svcsubproc.title: Install Mud Guards on 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 28 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position mud guard retainer (Item 7) and mud guard (Item 6) on the inside of the fender (Item 8). Install three pan head mach. screws with flat washers (Items 1 and 2) through the fender, mud guard and mud guard retainer and install three hex nuts with lock washers and flat washers (Items 3, 4 and 5) and tighten, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side mud guard.

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood-Bumper Mud Guards on 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 29 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, position hood-bumper mud guard (Item 3) on the inside front of the hood assembly (Item 4) and install four rivets with washers (Items 1 and 2) through the hood-bumper mud guard and into hood assembly securing them together, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side hood-bumper mud guard.
Close the hood, and fasten the hood latches on both sides.

svcsubproc.title: Install Mud Guards on 5500 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 20 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, position mud guard (Item 20) and mud guard channel bracket (Item 21) onto the rear side of the chassis splash panel and mud guard mounting bracket (Item 6). Install four hex bolts with flat washers (Items 1 and 2) through the four outboard mounting holes in the mud guard channel bracket, mud guard, chassis splash panel and mud guard mounting bracket and chassis mounted splash panel (Item 5), driver side shown.
Install four hex nuts with lock washers (Items 3 and 4) onto the four hex bolts (Item 1) but do not tighten, driver side shown.

Install hex bolt with flat washer (Items 7 and 8) through the mud guard channel bracket (Item 21), mud guard (Item 20) and chassis splash panel and mud guard mounting bracket (Item 6), driver side shown.
Install hex nut with lock washer (Items 9 and 10) and tighten, driver side shown.
Go back and tighten four hex bolts (Item 1) and hex nuts (Item 3), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side mud guard.
Close the hood, and fasten the hood latches on both sides.

svcsubproc.title: Install Hood-Bumper Mud Guards on 5500 i (SFA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 30 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, position hood-bumper mud guard (Item 3) on the inside front of the hood assembly (Item 4) and install four rivets with washers (Items 1 and 2) through the hood-bumper mud guard and into hood assembly securing them together, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side hood-bumper mud guard.
Close the hood, and fasten the hood latches on both sides.

svcsubproc.title: Install Mud Guards on 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 22 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, position mud guard (Item 24) and mud guard channel bracket (Item 25) onto the rear side of the chassis splash panel and mud guard mounting bracket (Item 6). Install four hex bolts with flat washers (Items 1 and 2) through the four outboard mounting holes in the mud guard channel bracket, mud guard, chassis splash panel and mud guard mounting bracket and chassis mounted splash panel (Item 5), driver side shown.
Install four hex nuts with lock washers (Items 3 and 4) onto the four hex bolts (Item 1) but do not tighten, driver side shown.

Install hex bolt with flat washer (Items 7 and 8) through the mud guard channel bracket (Item 25), mud guard (Item 24) and chassis splash panel and mud guard mounting bracket (Item 6), driver side shown.
Install hex nut with lock washer (Items 9 and 10) and tighten, driver side shown.
Go back and tighten four hex bolts (Item 1) and hex nuts (Item 3), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side mud guard.
Close the hood, and fasten the hood latches on both sides.

svcsubproc.title: Install Mud Guards on 5600 i (SBA) with Optional Butterfly Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 31 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: If removed, position mud guard mounting bracket (Item 5) on the inside of the fender assembly (Item 10). Install three hex bolts with flat washers (Items 6 and 7) through the fender well support bracket (Item 9), fender assembly (Item 10) and mud guard mounting bracket and install three hex lock nuts (Item 8) and tighten, driver side shown.

Position mud guard (Item 3) and mud guard reinforcement (Item 4) on the front side of the mud guard mounting bracket (Item 5) on the inside of the fender assembly (Item 10). Install four hex bolts through the mud guard mounting bracket, mud guard and mud guard reinforcement and install four hex lock nuts (Item 2) and tighten, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side mud guard and mud guard mounting bracket.

svcsubproc.title: Install Mud Guards on 5600 i (SBA) With Optional Butterfly Hood (8 X 4 and 8 X 6 with 65.5 and 72 inch Front Axle Spread)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 32 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: If removed, position mud guard mounting bracket (Item 5) on the inside of the fender assembly (Item 10). Install three hex bolts with flat washers (Items 6 and 7) through the fender well support bracket (Item 9), fender assembly (Item 10) and mud guard mounting bracket and install three hex lock nuts (Item 8) and tighten, driver side shown.

Position mud guard (Item 3) and mud guard reinforcement (Item 4) on the front side of the mud guard mounting bracket (Item 5) on the inside of the fender assembly (Item 10). Install four hex bolts through the mud guard mounting bracket, mud guard and mud guard reinforcement and install four hex lock nuts (Item 2) and tighten, driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side mud guard and mud guard mounting bracket.

svcsubproc.title: Install Fuel Tank Mud Guard Shield on 9900 i (SFA) and 9900 ix (SFA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 33 for all items in parentheses.

note.para: Before installing a new or the original fuel tank mud guard shield (Item 5) onto the fuel tank step, locate the slot marked on the fuel tank step during removal. Install hex bolt with fuel tank mud guard shield spacer (Items 1 and 2) through the marked slot of the fuel tank step as described in the following procedure.

step1.para: With hood tilted open, position fuel tank mud guard shield (Item 5, view in direction of arrow A and circle C) under the front of the fuel tank step (Item 6, view in direction of arrow A and circle C) and install hex bolt with fuel tank mud guard shield spacer (Items 1 and 2, view in direction of arrow A and circle C) through the fuel tank step and fuel tank mud guard shield and install hex lock nut with flat washer (Items 3 and 4, view in direction of arrow A and circle C), but do not tighten, driver side shown.

Position fuel tank mud guard shield (Item 10, view in direction of arrow B) at the fuel tank mounting bracket (Item 11, view in direction of arrow B) and install hex bolt (Item 7, view in direction of arrow B) through the fuel tank mounting bracket and fuel tank mud guard shield and install hex lock nut with flat washer (Items 8 and 9, view in direction of arrow B) and tighten, driver side shown.
Go back and tighten hex bolt (Item 1, view in direction of arrow A and circle C) and hex lock nut (Item 3, view in direction of arrow A and circle C), driver side shown.
Repeat this procedure to install passenger side fuel tank mud guard shield.
Close the hood, and fasten the hood latches on both sides.
